summary: **General Hospital** is an American TV soap opera that started in 1963. It's the longest-running soap in America and the third-longest in the world. The show is set in a fictional city called Port Charles, New York, and focuses on the lives of families like the Quartermaines and Spencers. It's known for its exciting storylines, famous guest stars, and winning many awards. Over the years, it has had famous actors like Roseanne Barr and James Franco. General Hospital is still on TV today and has been watched by millions of people.
title: General Hospital
